full_summary:
=================
**CCDB (Commercial Building Stock Database) Tender Notice**

### Notice Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-361-97031723
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000078841
* **Publication Date**: February 20, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 7, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: March 7, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 20, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2024

### Notice Context

The Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is issuing a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the development of a Commercial Building Stock Database (CCDB) to gather information on the composition and characteristics of the Canadian building stock.

### Tender Details

* **Procedure**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Methodology**: Market research (Etudes de marché)
* **Product/Service Brief**: NRCan seeks to acquire a database of commercial and institutional buildings in Canada, including their types and characteristics.
* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
* **Location**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0E4

### Selection Criteria

The successful bidder will be awarded based on the lowest cost-per-point.

### Tender Documents

* [RFP Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32379/179744--rfp--nrcan-5000078841.pdf)
* [RFP Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32379/179744-ddp--nrcan-5000078841_0.pdf)

### Contact

For more information, please contact:
Roya Ayam
Phone: (613) 000-0000
Email: [Roya.Ayam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca](mailto:Roya.Ayam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca)
